mapper.select: SELECT cu.*, p.*, ca.* FROM customer cu join cart ca on cu.customer_no = ca.customer_no join product p on ca.p_no = p.p_no WHERE cu.customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT p.*, pi.* FROM product p join p_image pi ON p.p_no = pi.p_no WHERE p.p_no = #{pNo}
